- Metric/“new” cutoff: Leading lab = top 5 distinct orgs on Chatbot Arena ELO. As of 2024-04-15, top labs: OpenAI, Anthropic, Google DeepMind, Cohere, Mistral AI. “New” = founded after 2024-04-15. Source: Chatbot Arena leaderboard (accessed 2024-04-15): https://chat.lmsys.org/?leaderboard

Precedents for rapid ascent
- Mistral AI: Founded 2023-04 (Wikipedia). In Arena’s top-5 by 2024-04-15 (<12 months). Sources: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mistral_AI; Chatbot Arena (2024-04-15): https://chat.lmsys.org/?leaderboard
- Anthropic: Founded 2021-01 (Wikipedia). Frontier status by 2023 with Claude 2 (released 2023-07-11), and in top-5 by 2024-04-15. Sources: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anthropic; Claude 2 release 2023-07-11: https://www.anthropic.com/news/claude-2; Arena (2024-04-15)

Post-cutoff new lab pipeline (founded after 2024-04-15)
- Safe Superintelligence Inc. (SSI): Announced/founded 2024-06-19. No Arena-ranked models as of 2024-10. Sources: SSI announcement 2024-06-19: https://www.ssi.inc/; Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Safe_Superintelligence; Arena leaderboard (checked 2024-10): https://chat.lmsys.org/?leaderboard
- No other post-2024-04-15 foundation-model labs appeared in Arena’s top-5 through 2024-10. Source: Arena leaderboard snapshots 2024-04→2024-10: https://chat.lmsys.org/?leaderboard

Enablers for fast entry
- Mega-rounds: xAI raised $6B (2024-05-26), enabling rapid scaling. Source: xAI Series B 2024-05-26: https://x.ai/blog/series-b
- Strategic partnerships: Mistral–Microsoft partnership (2024-02-26) provided distribution/compute, aiding ascent. Source: FT 2024-02-26: https://www.ft.com/content/cd6eb51a-3276-450f-87fd-97e8410db9eb
- Big-tech capital to independents: Amazon up to $4B into Anthropic (2023-09-25, 2024-03-27). Sources: Amazon press 2023-09-25 & 2024-03-27: https://www.aboutamazon.com/news/company-news/amazon-anthropic; https://www.aboutamazon.com/news/company-news/anthropic-selects-aws-as-primary-cloud-provider

Headwinds/industry structure
- Consolidation: Microsoft hired most of Inflection AI (2024-03-19), showing absorption risk for startups. Source: Microsoft 2024-03-19: https://blogs.microsoft.com/blog/2024/03/19/microsoft-hires-mustafa-suleyman-and-kar%C3%A9n-simonyan-to-form-microsoft-ai/
- Potential for new, well-funded spinouts: Demis Hassabis mused about leaving to found a new lab and raising billions (reported 2024-03-11). Source: The Information 2024-03-11: https://www.theinformation.com/articles/googles-demis-hassabis-chafes-under-new-ai-push
